page.title: 06SUPERSTITIONS/CUSTOMS-CONTD.
page.content: Always take Christmas decorations down twelve days after Christmas. Don't let anyone in your house unless they have been to church after birth. Don't pass the salt from hand to hand. It is considered unlucky to walk on the cracks in the pavement. Don't break a mirror or it's seven years bad luck. If you do break a mirror keep it for seven years and the bad luck will go. Pay the person who gives you a knife or some scissors or your friendship will be broken. When giving a purse to someone,make sure it contains a coin. Don't put new shoes on the table. Cover knives and mirrors when it thunders and lightens. Don't wear pearls with any garment coloured green.
